extendedInfo.description: Retirement Planner is an easy to use app and one stop source for your retirement planning needs!* Find which is better Traditional 401(k) or Roth 401(k)* Find which is better Traditional IRA or Roth IRA* How much do you save by saving and not spending? * How is your employer contribution adding up?* Are you really on track or do you want to save more?* Would you have a Surplus or Shortfall?* All the above customized just for you.Need more? Contact Dev!Ad supported. Ad free version coming soon.

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the app. They have rightly mentioned, the calculations are not guarenteed and intact they are not accurate. Whatever I enter, itsays I am on track though I know I am not. It does not know my lifestyle, conservative or extravagent and predicts that my savings will be fine which is notcorrect. With my 5 k saving every year, in next 30 years I will be worth around half million with 5% return which can beblown in 5 years with my lifestyle but the tool says,  is am on track.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Could define whether input values are to be annual, yearly, monthly, net, gross... (ie Income at Retirement... assuming monthly net??)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sudhir, you\'re a moron
reviews.comment: The app can\'t take into account you being a retard. I\'m on track to have 4.3 million at 65, and I can blow that by 66 and jump off a bridge destitute at 67. It tells you you\'re on track because it assumes you understand you want to die of old age and it assumes if you can\'t afford to eat at $1000/plate restaurants now, that you won\'t in retirement. If you are trying to live like a multi-millionaire in retirement but only saving 5k/yr, then you will work until you\'re 130 lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need expected inflation as a input (40k/y target is eq to 60k/y in 30years time.) Need cost of living adjustment in outflows.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Yes! This is exactly what I had in mind. Thanks for running with it! I\'ll see if I can put it to use and give some good feedback.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool.
reviews.comment: Now I see what I ve at retirement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just what I wanted. Simple and clean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It\'s okay for 401 K calculator, But there is no way to add in Roth IRA accounts, Separate brokerage or savings accounts.  It would also be nice to see how much interest you make per year actual number breakdowns
reviews.author: A Google User
